ERC20TransferFailed().notice: Failed to transfer ERC-20 tokens to application

depositERC20Tokens(address,address,uint2.notice: Transfer ERC-20 tokens to an application contract and add an input to the application's input box to signal such operation. The caller must allow the portal to withdraw at least `value` tokens from their account beforehand, by calling the `approve` function in the token contract.
